video_prompt: Futuristic city pulsates with activity. Elevated trains streak across gleaming tracks. Pedestrians move dynamically on bustling streets, passing active shop displays. Lights flicker and signs glow on towering, evolving buildings. Vehicles glide through the dense urban landscape.
image_prompt: Futuristic Japanese city at night, dense with towering white modular buildings, glowing blue and purple screens, elevated monorails with white and blue trains, bustling street level with bus-like vehicles, pedestrians, and neon-lit shops. Clear blue sky. High detail, vibrant sci-fi urban landscape.
refined_video_prompt: Activity pulsates. Trains streak past. Pedestrians dynamically flow, passing shifting shop displays. Lights flicker, signs glow, and building facades visibly alter. Vehicles glide through.
